name: Magnetolito
description:
Summary:

Help our Wannabe Hero, Magnetolito,  to put the Aerials parts on the specific deploy area. 

Use the left mouse button to apply his magnet power in the Aerial and control it directios with the mouse cursor. To complete a level you have to keep the objects inside de drop area for at least 3 seconds.

The quicker you do the job, the more stars you get! So, let's work to make our little villian richer so he can conquer the World.

Controls:

- Left Mouse Button: apply magnet force
- Mouse pointer/cursor - mangnet force direction
